children.text:
This mod adds crafting recipes for the horse armors and the leather saddle. Unless you use this mod none of the items (besides the leather horse armor) is possible to craft and can only be found in chests. If you want an easy way to get the items then this mod adds the possibility to obtain them by crafting.

Creator: SlapDashMC, Twitter Account

How do I craft the items?
The recipes a fairly simple. All they require are diamonds, gold ingots or iron ingots (depending on which armor you want to craft) and then one obsidian block. The saddle is crafted with some leather and an iron ingot.

Diamond Horse Armor (ID: 419) – 6 diamonds + 1 obsidian block
Gold Horse Armor (ID: 418) – 6 gold ingots + 1 obsidian block
Iron Horse Armor (ID: 417) – 6 iron ingots + 1 obsidian block
Leather Horse Armor (ID: 416) – 7 leather (default recipe)
Saddle (ID: 329) – 5 leather + 1 iron ingot
